wiki-desc: Awarded for watching shy/dense people getting close to each other, or having no idea what love is.

achievements.title: Stalker
achievements.desc: I’ll stalk you so hard you won’t notice me for 24 episodes. Why don’t you love me yet?

achievements.title: Unrequited love
achievements.desc: If you won’t confess, they’ll never know how you feel. But don’t bother if you’re the best girl - these never win.

achievements.title: Sparkles and bubbles
achievements.desc: Every time you two get close you feel butterflies in your stomach. Now kiss.

achievements.title: Heart full of love
achievements.desc: So many romance anime! You surely are an expert in relationships already.
